entry.value:
select emp.employee_id as empid, emp.emp_firstname as firstname, emp.emp_lastname as lastname, emp.emp_work_email as email, job.job_title as title, loc.country_code as country, loc.city, mgr.employee_id as mgrId, stat.name as status, concat(emp.emp_firstname, '.', emp.emp_lastname) as userid, dept.name as department, CASE WHEN emp.termination_id IS NOT NULL or stat.name like 'Inactive%' THEN True ELSE False END as term, ftostart, ftoend
from hs_hr_employee as emp
left outer join (select ohrm_leave.emp_number, min(ohrm_leave.date) as ftostart, max(ohrm_leave.date) as ftoend from ohrm_leave group by ohrm_leave.emp_number) as fto on fto.emp_number=emp.emp_number left outer join ohrm_job_title as job on emp.job_title_code=job.id left outer join hs_hr_emp_reportto as empmgr on emp.emp_number=empmgr.erep_sub_emp_number left outer join hs_hr_employee as mgr on empmgr.erep_sup_emp_number=mgr.emp_number left outer join hs_hr_emp_locations as emploc on emp.emp_number=emploc.emp_number left outer join ohrm_location as loc on emploc.location_id=loc.id left outer join ohrm_employment_status as stat on emp.emp_status=stat.id left outer join ohrm_subunit as dept on emp.work_station=dept.id left outer join ohrm_emp_termination as term on emp.emp_number=term.emp_number

select emp.employee_id as empid, emp.emp_firstname as firstname, emp.emp_lastname as lastname, emp.emp_work_email as email, job.job_title as title, loc.country_code as country, loc.city, mgr.employee_id as mgrId, stat.name as status, concat(emp.emp_firstname, '.', emp.emp_lastname) as userid, dept.name as department, CASE WHEN emp.termination_id IS NOT NULL or stat.name like 'Inactive%' THEN True ELSE False END as term, ftostart, ftoend
from hs_hr_employee as emp
left outer join (select ohrm_leave.emp_number, min(ohrm_leave.date) as ftostart, max(ohrm_leave.date) as ftoend from ohrm_leave group by ohrm_leave.emp_number) as fto on fto.emp_number=emp.emp_number left outer join ohrm_job_title as job on emp.job_title_code=job.id left outer join hs_hr_emp_reportto as empmgr on emp.emp_number=empmgr.erep_sub_emp_number left outer join hs_hr_employee as mgr on empmgr.erep_sup_emp_number=mgr.emp_number left outer join hs_hr_emp_locations as emploc on emp.emp_number=emploc.emp_number left outer join ohrm_location as loc on emploc.location_id=loc.id left outer join ohrm_employment_status as stat on emp.emp_status=stat.id left outer join ohrm_subunit as dept on emp.work_station=dept.id left outer join ohrm_emp_termination as term on emp.emp_number=term.emp_number where emp.employee_id='$(identity)'

select emp.employee_id as empid, emp.emp_firstname as firstname, emp.emp_lastname as lastname, emp.emp_work_email as email, job.job_title as title, loc.country_code as country, loc.city, mgr.employee_id as mgrId, stat.name as status, concat(emp.emp_firstname, '.', emp.emp_lastname) as userid, dept.name as department, CASE WHEN emp.termination_id IS NOT NULL or stat.name like 'Inactive%' THEN True ELSE False END as term, ftostart, ftoend
from hs_hr_employee as emp
left outer join (select ohrm_leave.emp_number, min(ohrm_leave.date) as ftostart, max(ohrm_leave.date) as ftoend from ohrm_leave group by ohrm_leave.emp_number) as fto on fto.emp_number=emp.emp_number left outer join ohrm_job_title as job on emp.job_title_code=job.id left outer join hs_hr_emp_reportto as empmgr on emp.emp_number=empmgr.erep_sub_emp_number left outer join hs_hr_employee as mgr on empmgr.erep_sup_emp_number=mgr.emp_number left outer join hs_hr_emp_locations as emploc on emp.emp_number=emploc.emp_number left outer join ohrm_location as loc on emploc.location_id=loc.id left outer join ohrm_employment_status as stat on emp.emp_status=stat.id left outer join ohrm_subunit as dept on emp.work_station=dept.id left outer join ohrm_emp_termination as term on emp.emp_number=term.emp_number
where emp.emp_firstname=substring_index("$(identity)", '.', 1) and emp.emp_lastname=substring_index("$(identity)", '.', -1)

Reference.name: Set Unique Username (I18n) with email on Identity Creation
